thread.section_title: SIP Scootershop Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von SIP Scootershop | www.sip-scootershop.com | 4 von 412
thread.title: Pedro

author: Pedro
title: Pedro
text: Great products, awesome quality, personnel very helpful and understanding. I was initially charged with twice the shipping cost (to Canada) that was agreed. Personnel immediately refunded me the difference after I messaged them. Understandable since most orders must be within the european union. Shipping calculator could be more accurate though. Overall very positive impression. Thanks.
